mean_cn: n. 【棒球】投手，水罐，【植】瓶状叶
mean_en: (in baseball) the player who throws the ball to the batter; a container with a handle and a lip, for holding and pouring liquids
sentence: The pitcher throws the ball away with his best effort.
sentence_trans: 投手尽自己最大的努力把球投了出去。
word_etyma: pitch扔，投+er名词后缀→pitcher投手，有柄水罐
